name.japanese: サンダーストーム テンポ

description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact weather manipulation weapon to conjure a powerful, angry thunderstorm cloud of epic proportions. This advanced weather technique can neutralize enemy attacks and demonstrates Nami's mastery of meteorological warfare.
strengths: Effective against mechanical weapons like Foxy's boxing gloves
Demonstrates Nami's growth as a combatant
Does not require Devil Fruit powers
weaknesses: Dependent on having the Clima-Tact weapon
May be less effective in unfavorable weather conditions
firstUsedAgainst: Foxy and his fiery boxing gloves
significance: Demonstrates Nami's evolution as a fighter and her ability to counter diverse threats. This technique proves that non-Devil Fruit users can develop powerful combat abilities through skill and intelligence.
visualDescription: Nami manipulates her Clima-Tact to create an angry thunderstorm cloud that neutralizes enemy attacks and can potentially strike enemies with lightning.

keyMoments.description: First use of Thunderstorm Tempo to neutralize Foxy's fiery boxing gloves and punching tanks
keyMoments.context: Used during the final confrontation with Foxy Pirates on the Sexy Foxy ship

description: Luffy spins his body rapidly like a spinning top, using his rubber properties to create a whirling attack. This creative application of the Gomu Gomu no Mi demonstrates Luffy's continuous innovation with his Devil Fruit abilities.
requirements: Gomu Gomu no Mi Devil Fruit
strengths: Shows creative use of rubber properties
Can be used both offensively and defensively
significance: Demonstrates Luffy's adaptability and creative problem-solving in combat. Shows that he continues to discover new applications for his Devil Fruit powers.
visualDescription: Luffy rapidly spins his entire body like a top, creating a whirling rubber attack that can strike or deflect enemies.

keyMoments.description: Debut of Gomu Gomu no Koma during battle with Foxy
keyMoments.context: Used to turn the tide of battle against the Foxy Pirates

description: A punching technique employed by Foxy during combat. The exact mechanics are unclear, but it represents another technique in Foxy's combat arsenal.
strengths: Can be combined with Noro Noro Beam tactics
weaknesses: Proved ineffective against Luffy and Nami's teamwork
significance: Shows Foxy's diverse combat techniques, though it ultimately fails against the Straw Hats' superior coordination.
visualDescription: Foxy performs a punching attack, likely themed around crabs based on the name.

keyMoments.description: Debut of Kani Kani Punch during final confrontation
keyMoments.context: Used against the Straw Hats during the battle on the Sexy Foxy ship
